info.title: Assets - Deadlock API
info.description:
## API Clients

We have auto generated and updated clients for many languages. You can find them here: [https://github.com/deadlock-api/openapi-clients](https://github.com/deadlock-api/openapi-clients)

## Support the Deadlock API

Whether you're building your own database, developing data science projects, or enhancing your website with game and player analytics, the Deadlock API has the data you need.

Your sponsorship helps keep this resource open, free and future-proof for everyone. By supporting the Deadlock API, you will enable continued development, new features and reliable access for developers, analysts and streamers worldwide.

Help us continue to provide the data you need - sponsor the Deadlock API today!

**-> You can Sponsor the Deadlock API on [Patreon](https://www.patreon.com/c/user?u=68961896) or [GitHub](https://github.com/sponsors/raimannma)**

## Disclaimer
_deadlock-api.com is not endorsed by Valve and does not reflect the views or opinions of Valve or anyone officially involved in producing or managing Valve properties. Valve and all associated properties are trademarks or registered trademarks of Valve Corporation_

red.title: Red
red.description: The red value of the color.

green.title: Green
green.description: The green value of the color.

blue.title: Blue
blue.description: The blue value of the color.

alpha.title: Alpha
alpha.description: The alpha value of the color.

minimap.title: Minimap
minimap.description: The minimap image of the map.

plain.title: Plain
plain.description: The minimap image of the map without background image and frame image.

background.title: Background
background.description: The background image of the map.

frame.title: Frame
frame.description: The frame image of the map.

mid.title: Mid
mid.description: The mid image of the map.

zipline_paths.title: Zipline Paths
zipline_paths.description: The ziplane paths of the map. Each path is a list of P0, P1, and P2 points, describing the cubic spline.

match_time_mins_for_level2_pickups.title: Match Time Mins For Level2 Pickups

match_time_mins_for_level3_pickups.title: Match Time Mins For Level3 Pickups

ModifierDefinition.title: ModifierDefinition
ModifierDefinition.description: Schema for the m_sModifer block (note the typo in the source key 'Modifer').

ModifierValue.title: ModifierValue
ModifierValue.description:
Handles items within m_vecModifierValues and m_vecScriptValues.
Captures both fixed values (m_value) and ranged values (m_valueMin/Max).

gold_reward_bonus_percent_per_minute.title: Gold Reward Bonus Percent Per Minute

no_shield_laser_dps_to_players.title: No Shield Laser Dps To Players

attack_t3_boss_phase2_max_range.title: Attack T3 Boss Phase2 Max Range

t1_boss_dpsmax_resist_time_in_seconds.title: T1 Boss Dpsmax Resist Time In Seconds

t2_boss_dpsmax_resist_time_in_seconds.title: T2 Boss Dpsmax Resist Time In Seconds

left_relative.title: Left Relative
left_relative.description: The relative margin left of the map image.

top_relative.title: Top Relative
top_relative.description: The relative margin top of the map image.

recoil_shot_index_recovery_time_factor.title: Recoil Shot Index Recovery Time Factor

shots_per_second.title: Shots Per Second
shots_per_second.description: Calculates the shots per second of the weapon

shots_per_second_with_reload.title: Shots Per Second With Reload
shots_per_second_with_reload.description: Calculates the shots per second of the weapon adjusted for reload time

bullets_per_second.title: Bullets Per Second
bullets_per_second.description: Calculates the bullets per second of the weapon, by multiplying shots per second by bullets per shot.

bullets_per_second_with_reload.title: Bullets Per Second With Reload
bullets_per_second_with_reload.description: Calculates the bullets per second of the weapon adjusted for reload time.

damage_per_second.title: Damage Per Second
damage_per_second.description: Calculates the damage per second of the weapon, by multiplying bullets per second by bullet damage.

damage_per_second_with_reload.title: Damage Per Second With Reload
damage_per_second_with_reload.description: Calculates the damage per second of the weapon adjusted for reload time.

damage_per_shot.title: Damage Per Shot
damage_per_shot.description: Calculates the damage per shot of the weapon, by multiplying bullets per shot by bullet damage.

damage_per_magazine.title: Damage Per Magazine
damage_per_magazine.description: Calculates the damage per magazine of the weapon, by multiplying clip size by damage per shot.

P0_points.title: P0 Points
P0_points.description: The P0 points of the path.

P1_points.title: P1 Points
P1_points.description: The P1 points of the path.

P2_points.title: P2 Points
P2_points.description: The P2 points of the path.

tags.name: Items
tags.description:
Items are purchasable objects in the game.

There are 3 main types of items:
- Upgrade Items
- Ability Items
- Weapon Items
